transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello yes.
Executive: Ha sir call is from Isha Prosthetics.
Customer: Yes yes ma'am tell me.
Executive: Yes ma'am Shubham this side from IndiaMART ma'am.
Customer: Yeah hi.
Executive: Hello ma'am sir that is yeah hi. Uh sir I want to change my title.
Executive: Sorry what what do you want to change?
Customer: Business name title.
Executive: Business name title na to uh you have GST?
Customer: Yeah I have GST.
Executive: You have did it see the same in the GST ma'am?
Customer: Sorry sorry yeah we have registered same name in GST as of now Isha Prosthetics.
Executive: Yes okay so you want to change company name na?
Customer: Yeah yeah.
Executive: Okay so you have updated that on GST ma'am?
Customer: No that's what I wanted to ask you the details.
Executive: Because ma'am actually the name of company is registered on the basis of your GST only ma'am.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: So whatever name is registered will be registered.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: So if you want to change the company name okay we can change name in our website and desktop okay but the front name na so the the bold name we can't change that. We can change name in about we can change in other tab okay but the main profile section we can't change the name because that name automatic taken by the GST as per GST ma'am.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay. So whatever you want to change please change in your GST and share the GST certificate we will change that.
Executive: Okay then address your your address company name okay your any proprietor and partnership any kind of thing will be changed on only basis of GST ma'am.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay. So okay so just okay I think you call to customer care customer care na na.
Customer: Ha yes sir.
Executive: Okay okay okay that's why a complaint is open. I think you have my my my statement clear na okay.
Customer: Yes sir I got it sir the complaints which was raised right?
Customer: Uh we have cleared that already so will it be closed or should the person should close it?
Executive: Sorry ma'am.
Customer: I will say that there is a complaint raised you know on Isha Prosthetics.
Executive: Oh yes yes yes ma'am yes ma'am.
Customer: From the client.
Executive: Yeah there is one client who raised a complaint actually okay I think Ravi Ravi na Ravi yeah I think that complaint has resolved now already?
Customer: Yeah it's resolved already.
Executive: It's resolved na I think you on I can see na this complaint has been closed on 11 okay and you have already I think delivered the product na ma'am?
Customer: Yeah yeah yes yes yes.
Executive: Yes yes the buyer yes buyer has received the product and your complaint has complaint there is only one complaint you have called just now na on customer care so that complaint has opened right now so I can close complaint as well na na.
Customer: Yeah you can close sir.
Executive: Okay we'll close madam I'll tell you one thing more ma'am like right now who is you are the one who is using and somebody else is using IndiaMART ma'am?
Customer: I'm the one using I'm the one using.
Executive: Okay so ma'am tell me like you can you already know ma'am you are using very limited very less on IndiaMART like I can see na you are almost active on 12 days in all 30 almost in in a month or you are active on 12 days ma'am okay so this is basically very low as per our product plan and very motion and our competition ma'am so do one thing ma'am I I will suggest you like you have like I think you will be busy in many things all day okay so I will suggest you like you are getting na one lead on daily basis.
Customer: Yeah.
Customer: And 10 weekly so you can that's what that's one we will change the title and everything and after that we will think about think about.
Executive: Okay no problem you just complete location and everything.
Executive: No no problem I I will suggest you one thing like you I you know you want to know like you can't promote this name ma'am?
Customer: Yeah yeah yeah.
Executive: Okay so do one thing just just just I understand ma'am just change the name on GST okay you can go on GST portal as well there you can apply for the name change of company okay after the name change you can share me the documents and and I will change the name here as well okay.
Customer: Okay sir.
Executive: Okay after that whatever you need from my side I will do the help but but I am suggesting you like there are many buyers are coming on your on your page but they are we are not able to respond that on timely ma'am that's why they are many buyers are not able to do business with us okay so I just I I am just suggesting you to to be active more on IndiaMART.
Executive: Okay so we can convert our buyer easily ma'am okay because you if if any buyer is fresh ma'am then then he will respond you properly ma'am.
Customer: Okay ma'am.
Executive: Okay sir.
Executive: Okay so just change the name and send the document I will I will I will do one thing I will do WhatsApp on the number as well so you can get my number okay so whenever you change your company name you share the document on that number I will update here okay.
Customer: Okay sir.
Executive: Okay ma'am.
Executive: Thank you for.
Customer: Excuse me hello.
Executive: Yes ma'am yes ma'am.
Customer: That is the reason why we are changing because of the complaint raised right? So it is all being misused so that is we are changing everything.
Executive: Sorry ma'am is somebody misusing your name ma'am company name?
Customer: Yeah yeah that is why we are yeah I mean ex worker only is working with us.
Executive: Okay so you are thinking somebody is misusing your company name and he is taking buyer on your company na?
Customer: Yes yes that is why we are we want to change this.
Executive: Okay okay okay.
Customer: I just now doesn't have the access because we are I have the OTP number and all so we have that. So he doesn't have any accessibility for that.
Executive: Okay so who has the primary number ma'am you didn't have primary number of IndiaMART?
Customer: I have I only have now present.
Executive: Then then you can do one thing na ma'am you can force log out from all devices okay so whenever IndiaMART is login thus account will be log out from all devices then you can log in in only in your phone or on desktop only ma'am.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay na so this is the one thing if somebody has login profile and service will be log out ma'am.
Customer: Hmm hmm sorry okay.
Executive: You are saying na somebody is using your profile na ma'am?
Customer: Ha ha ha yeah.
Executive: Okay so you can do one thing you can just log out from all devices do one thing you just go on your seller panel okay in settings you can see na settings you in account settings you can there will be a one option where you can see na log out from all devices ma'am.
Customer: Yeah yeah that I have done already okay I'll log out from all the devices again I'll check it.
Executive: Okay na okay so so so your account will be log out from all the devices after that nobody able to use until you will share the OTP because he can only log in via your primary number or primary mail ID only.
Customer: Okay understood.
Executive: Okay okay ma'am.
Customer: Okay thank you sir.
Executive: Okay thank you for time.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to change business name title.

- Complaint raised was already cleared.

- Someone is misusing company name.



Resolution:

- Asked to change name in GST.

- Asked to share GST certificate.

- Suggested to log out from all devices.

- Executive will share WhatsApp number.

- Complaint will be closed.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- company name change, gst, complaint, log out
